title: Palindrome strings
description: A palindrome is a word, phrase, number, or other sequence of characters which reads the same backward or forward. Allowances may be made for adjustments to capital letters, punctuation, and word dividers.
editorLoadText: // write your code in the editor here
prompt: write a function named 'isPalindrome' and have it except a string. Have your function return true if the string is a palindrome and false if not.

title: Reverse String
description: A function that takes a string input and reverses it.

prompt: Using the JavaScript language, have the function FirstReverse(str) take the str parameter being passed and return the string in reversed order.
